entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Rock River
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 01:11 AM MST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -21.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Rock River 04:00 AM MST Thursday 02 February 2023
Temperature: -21.7°C
Pressure: 101.6 kPa
Humidity: 62 %
Wind Chill: -28
Dewpoint: -27.1°C
Wind: NW 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Blizzard. Temperature steady near minus 21.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Blizzard developing late this morning. Periods of light snow near the Ogilvie mountains. Local blowing snow this morning. Wind east 20 km/h increasing to 40 gusting to 60 except gusting to 90 near the Richardson mountains this afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 21. Wind chill near minus 35. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow except blizzard near the Richardson mountains. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60 except gusting to 90 near the Richardson mountains. Low minus 23. Wind chill near minus 38. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow. Temperature falling to minus 26 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow except blizzard near the Richardson mountains early in the morning. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60 except gusting to 90 near the Richardson mountains early in the morning. Wind becoming east 20 in the morning then light late in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 26 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 38 in the morning and minus 32 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Thursday 02 February 2023
